creator: Joerg Jahnke
descriptionHtml:
The lands of Fareor have been overrun by monsters. With a single hero you set out to free the lands of this monster plague. On your journey you quickly gain assistance by more heroes that share this goal. So enter the lands of Fareor, solve the various missions with ever-increasing difficulty. Defeat the boss enemies to find map pieces guiding the way to further powerful heroes that may help you. Try to get as far as possible to rise up the ranks in the leaderboards. And finally become the liberator of the realm who completes all the missions of the three difficulty levels (normal, nightmare, hell).

The game contains eleven heroes of four different archetypes (warrior, supporter, archer and wizard). Each hero has a unique set of special abilities that can be used in combat. Up to four heroes can be used on a mission and you can select the heroes that best fit the mission. Level up the heroes to let them increase their skill bonus in more than a dozen different skills plus their special abilities, and unlock all of the heroes' special abilities.

If you like the game, please rate it! If you don't like it, then please contact me and give feedback how to improve it. Thanks!

If you would like to see the game localized to another language and would volunteer to do the translation, then please drop me a note. On completion I'd add your name to the game's About dialog for the new language and we'd have the game localized for your preferred language :-).

Available game settings to customize the game: Sound on/off, music on/off, pixelated "retro" graphics / normal graphics, tutorial messages on/off.

Features to be added in later releases: More monsters, more armor and weapon abilities, more heroes, further game modes.

Up to four heroes can be used on a mission and you can select the heroes that best fit the mission. Level up the heroes to let them increase their skill bonus in more than a dozen different skills plus their special abilities, and unlock all of the heroes' special abilities.

If you like the game, please rate it! If you don't like it, then please contact me and give feedback how to improve it. Thanks!

If you would like to see the game localized to another language and would volunteer to do the translation, then please drop me a note. On completion I'd add your name to the game's About dialog for the new language and we'd have the game localized for your preferred language :-).

Available game settings to customize the game: Sound on/off, music on/off, pixelated "retro" graphics / normal graphics, tutorial messages on/off.

Features to be added in later releases: More monsters, more armor and weapon abilities, more heroes, further game modes.
descriptionShort: Gather different heroes and a fight battles to free the lands from monsters
title: Battles of Fareor - A collectible heroes RPG

creator: Joerg Jahnke
descriptionHtml:
The lands of Fareor have been overrun by monsters. With a single hero you set out to free the lands of this monster plague. On your journey you quickly gain assistance by more heroes that share this goal. So enter the lands of Fareor, solve the various missions with ever-increasing difficulty. Defeat the boss enemies to find map pieces guiding the way to further powerful heroes that may help you. Try to get as far as possible to rise up the ranks in the leaderboards. And finally become the liberator of the realm who completes all the missions of the three difficulty levels (normal, nightmare, hell).

The game contains eleven heroes of four different archetypes (warrior, supporter, archer and wizard). Each hero has a unique set of special abilities that can be used in combat. Up to four heroes can be used on a mission and you can select the heroes that best fit the mission. Level up the heroes to let them increase their skill bonus in more than a dozen different skills plus their special abilities, and unlock all of the heroes' special abilities.

If you like the game, please rate it! If you don't like it, then please contact me and give feedback how to improve it. Thanks!

If you would like to see the game localized to another language and would volunteer to do the translation, then please drop me a note. On completion I'd add your name to the game's About dialog for the new language and we'd have the game localized for your preferred language :-).

Available game settings to customize the game: Sound on/off, music on/off, pixelated "retro" graphics / normal graphics, tutorial messages on/off.

Features to be added in later releases: More monsters, more armor and weapon abilities, more heroes, further game modes.
